name: March 7th, the Apex Heroine
simple_desc: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single enemy and increases the Hits Per Action and DMG chance of the next Enhanced Basic ATK.
desc:
Deals Imaginary DMG equal to #1[i]% of March 7th's ATK to one designated enemy target.
Increases the initial Hits Per Action of the next Enhanced Basic ATK by #2[i] hit(s) and increase the fixed chance of additionally dealing DMG by #3[i]%.
